name: shikudo basic
matches: ^\w+ lashes out with a straight kick at you\.$
^Pain blossoms as the instep of \w+'s foot smashes into the vulnerable cluster of nerves beneath your right arm, sending you spinning from your mount\.$
^\w+ spins a full rotation, bringing .+ around in a blur to crash into your .+\.$
^Dropping back into a low crouch, \w+ whips .+ at your .+\.$
^\w+ whips .+ at the side of your neck\.$
^\w+ lashes out with a high kick at your head\.$
^Lunging off \w+ back foot, \w+ viciously drives the end of .+ into your solar plexus\.$
^The staff cracks across your \w+ thigh, the muscles suddenly becoming weak\.$
^Your \w+ arm goes numb as the length of the staff cracks across it\.$
Blinding pain radiates from your throat and you suddenly find yourself unable to draw breath.
You feel your knee crunch under the force of the kick, nausea and pain racking you.
The staff takes you off your feet, sending you sprawling.
The end of the staff drives into your left leg, sending lances of pain along the entire limb.
The staff drives into your torso, a shock of pain running through the limb.
